title: Discovering that your luggage is overweight and having to pay additional fees or rearrange your belongings to meet the weight limit.

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Good morning! May I see your passport and flight details, please? Oh, I see that you have two checked bags. Do you happen to know the weight limit for each bag?
turns.user_response_option_en: I did not know about the weight limit. Can you help?
turns.key_phrase_en: weight limit (Note: "about the" is not part of the key phrase)

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Good morning! May I see your passport and flight details, please? Oh, I see that you have two checked bags. Do you happen to know the weight limit for each bag?
turns.user_response_option_en: Could I remove some items to adjust the weight?
